TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntityTemplateFactory extends System.Object

span.span: Creates an entity template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于在运行时动态数据获取表的实体模板的实例。The class is used at run time by Dynamic Data to get an instance of an entity template for a table. 实体模板是用户控件，用于将应用于整个表行，而不是单个数据字段，就像字段模板一样。Entity templates are user controls that apply to a whole table row instead of a single data field, as with field templates. 页上显示的实体模板，应使用类。The entity templates are displayed on a page by using the class. 它们使用字段模板来显示数据模型中的值。They use field templates to display values from the data model. 动态数据提供了默认 ~\DynamicData\EntityTemplates 文件夹中找到的实体模板。Dynamic Data provides default entity templates that are found in the ~\DynamicData\EntityTemplates folder. 您可以修改这些默认实体模板或创建自定义模板来更改外观和行为的一个表。You can modify these default entity templates or create custom ones to change the appearance and behavior for a table. 模板用于显示、 编辑和插入操作。There are templates for display, edit, and insert operations. ## Examples 有关如何使用实体模板的示例，请参阅[演练： 自定义表布局使用实体模板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/03d33a22-d3c0-41df-a717-82ce86329a08)。For an example of how to use entity templates, see [Walkthrough: Customizing Table Layout Using Entity Templates](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/03d33a22-d3c0-41df-a717-82ce86329a08).

related.span: 演练： 使用实体模板的自定义表布局

span.span: Walkthrough: Customizing Table layout using Entity Templates

param.span: 要为其生成路径的实体模板的名称。

span.span: The name of the entity template for which to build the path.
The display mode of the entity template.

summary.span: 为指定表生成实体模板的路径。

span.span: Builds the path of the entity template for the specified table.

returns.span: 指定表的实体模板的路径。

span.span: The path of the entity template for the specified table.
The is **null**.
